original_text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples, if ye have love one to another.
korean_text: 너희가 서로 사랑하면 이로써 모든 사람이 너희가 내 제자인 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: By this shall all men know
sentences.korean_translation: 이것으로 모든 사람이 알게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: if ye have love one to another
